description:
A Special Day
New clothes and a lot of presents! Fumi is very happy, while Bunji, who looks at them, gets very annoyed. That`s right, today is Fumi`s first day of school entrance ceremony.  A new spring has arrived at the Kamohara family.
Growing Up
Bunji, who has gone up to the next grade, is in the same class as his good friends Ma, Chi, Daichi, Chinatsu and so on. Bunji feels relieved. Meanwhile, the teacher is deciding on the committee members, but...
Farewell
Bunji, who is now in the third grade, gets upset when the girls talked casually. Bunji tries to call upon his imaginary friend, Aso, who does not appear right away...
Cat Daughter
The much-loved dog of the Kamohara family, Jon, has left the family to marry and live with Mary. Meanwhile, Fumi, who loves cats, pesters Mom to get a cat as usual...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Special Day / Growing Up / Farewell / Cat Daughter
特別な日 / 成長 / わかれ / ねこむすめ
